title: Earthly beings
creator_credit: Chuck Eyler, Jacolyn Kildare and Heaping Teaspoon Animation
brief_description: An animated film depicting nature and the way it feeds upon itself. Ink and paint illustrations are from the works of anatomist, Andreas Vesalius of Brussels 1514-1564, Music is composed and conducted by Katherine Alisa Arnold
